Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections from gastric or esophageal cancer
Purpose: Semi-quantitative assessment of HER2 expression to aid diagnosis and treatment planning in gastric and esophageal cancers.
Container: Positively charged glass slide for FFPE tissue section
Equipment: Microscope, manual staining rack, microtome, water bath, slide warmer, timer
